DOC.HEADLINE: FOR THE RECORD
DOC.TEXT: More winners -- An article Monday about the winners of Los Angeles Area Emmy Awards omitted the names of several KTLA-TV Channel 5 employees who contributed to the Malibu fire reporting that was named best live coverage of an unscheduled news_event . Also sharing_in the award were producer Christine Michie and reporters Carlos Amezcua , Barbara Beck , Jann Carl , Hal Fishman , Mark Kriski , Larry McCormick and Michele Ruiz .
